entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
